verses.verse: Then<WG5119> shall the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> be likened<WG3666> unto<WG3933> ten<WG1176> virgins<WG3933>, which<WG3748> took<WG2983> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>, and went<WG1831> forth<WG1519> to meet<WG529> the bridegroom<WG3566>.
And<WG1161> five<WG4002> of<WG1537> them<WG846> were<WG2258> wise<WG5429>, and<WG2532> five<WG4002> were foolish<WG3474>.
They that<WG3748> were foolish<WG3474> took<WG2983> their<WG1438> lamps<WG2985>, and took<WG2983> no<WG3756> oil<WG1637> with<WG3326> them<WG1438>:
But<WG1161> the wise<WG5429> took<WG2983> oil<WG1637> in<WG1722> their<WG846> vessels<WG30> with<WG3326> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>.
While<WG1161> the bridegroom<WG3566> stayed<WG5549>, they<WG3573> all<WG3956> slumbered<WG3573> and<WG2532> slept<WG2518>.
And<WG1161> at mid<WG3319> night<WG3571> there was<WG1096> a cry<WG2906> made<WG1096>, Behold<WG2400>, the bridegroom<WG3566> comes<WG2064>; go you<WG1831> out<WG1519> to meet<WG529> him<WG846>.
Then<WG5119> all<WG3956> those<WG1565> virgins<WG3933> arose<WG1453>, and<WG2532> trimmed<WG2885> their<WG846> lamps<WG2985>.
And<WG1161> the foolish<WG3474> said<WG2036> unto the wise<WG5429>, Give<WG1325> us<WG2254> of<WG1537> your<WG5216> oil<WG1637>; for<WG3754> our<WG2257> lamps<WG2985> are gone out<WG4570>.

But<WG1161> the wise<WG5429> answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004>, Not so<WG3379>; lest there be<WG714> not<WG3756> enough<WG714> for us<WG2254> and<WG2532> you<WG5213>: but<WG1161> go you<WG4198> rather<WG3123> to<WG4314> them that sell<WG4453>, and<WG2532> buy<WG59> for yourselves<WG1438>.

And<WG1161> while<WG565> they<WG846> went<WG565> to buy<WG59>, the bridegroom<WG3566> came<WG2064>; and<WG2532> they that were ready<WG2092> went in<WG1525> with<WG3326> him<WG846> to<WG1519> the marriage<WG1062>: and<WG2532> the door<WG2374> was shut<WG2808>.
Afterward<WG5305><WG99999> came<WG2064> also<WG2532> the<WG3933> other<WG3062> virgins<WG3933>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, Lord<WG2962>, open<WG455> to us<WG2254>.
But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, I know<WG1492> you<WG5209> not<WG3756>.
Watch<WG1127> therefore<WG3767>, for<WG3754> you know<WG1492> neither<WG3756> the day<WG2250> nor<WG3761> the hour<WG5610> in which<WG1722><WG99999> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> comes<WG2064>.

For<WG1063> the kingdom of heaven is as<WG5618> a man<WG444> travelling into a far country<WG589>, who called<WG2564> his own<WG2398> servants<WG1401>, and<WG2532> delivered<WG3860> unto them<WG846> his<WG846> goods<WG5224>.

And<WG2532> unto one<WG3739><WG99999> he gave<WG1325> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>, to another<WG3739><WG99999> two<WG1417>, and<WG1161> to another<WG3739> one<WG1520>; to every man<WG1538> according to<WG2596> his own<WG2398> ability<WG1411>; and<WG2532> directly<WG2112> took his journey<WG589>.

Then<WG1161> he that had received<WG2983> the five<WG4002> talents<WG5007> went<WG4198> and traded<WG2038> with<WG1722> the same<WG846>, and<WG2532> made<WG4160> them other<WG243> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>.
And<WG2532> likewise<WG5615> he that<WG3588> had received two<WG1417>, he<WG846> also<WG2532> gained<WG2770> other<WG243> two<WG1417>.
But<WG1161> he that had received<WG2983> one<WG1520> went<WG565> and dug<WG3736> in<WG1722> the earth<WG1093>, and<WG2532> hid<WG613> his<WG846> lord<WG2962>'s money<WG694>.
After<WG3326> a<WG5550> long<WG4183> time<WG5550> the lord<WG2962> of<WG1401> those<WG1565> servants<WG1401> comes<WG2064>, and<WG2532> reckoned<WG4868><WG99999> with<WG3326> them<WG846>.

And so<WG2532> he that had received<WG2983> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007> came<WG4334> and brought<WG4374> other<WG243> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, you delivered<WG3860> unto me<WG3427> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007>: behold<WG1492>, I have gained<WG2770> beside<WG1909> them<WG846> five<WG4002> talents<WG5007> more<WG243>.

His<WG846> lord<WG2962> said<WG5346> unto him<WG846>, Well done<WG2095>, good<WG18> and<WG2532> faithful<WG4103> servant<WG1401>; you have been<WG2258> faithful<WG4103> over<WG1909> a few things<WG3641>, I will make<WG2525> you<WG4571> ruler<WG2525> over<WG1909> many things<WG4183>: enter you<WG1525> into<WG1519> the joy<WG5479> of<WG2962> your<WG4675> lord<WG2962>.

And<WG2532> I was afraid<WG5399>, and went<WG565> and hid<WG2928> your<WG4675> talent<WG5007> in<WG1722> the earth<WG1093>: behold<WG1492>, there you have<WG2192> that is your<WG4674>.

His<WG846> lord<WG2962> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, You wicked<WG4190> and<WG2532> slothful<WG3636> servant<WG1401>, you knew<WG1492> that<WG3754> I reap<WG2325> where<WG3699> I sowed<WG4687> not<WG3756>, and<WG2532> gather<WG4863> where<WG3606> I have<WG1287> not<WG3756> spread<WG1287>:

You<WG4571> should<WG1163> therefore<WG3767> to have put<WG906> my<WG3450> money<WG694> to the exchangers<WG5133>, and<WG2532> then at my coming<WG2064> I<WG1473> should have received<WG2865><WG99999> my own<WG1699> with<WG4862> interest<WG5110>.
Take<WG142> therefore<WG3767> the talent<WG5007> from<WG575> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> give<WG1325> it to him which has<WG2192> ten<WG1176> talents<WG5007>.

For<WG1063> to<WG2192> every<WG3956> one that has<WG2192> shall be given<WG1325>, and<WG2532> he shall have abundance<WG4052>: but<WG1161> from<WG575> him<WG846> that has<WG2192> not<WG3361> shall be taken<WG142> away<WG575> even<WG2532> that which<WG3739> he has<WG2192>.

And<WG2532> cast you<WG1544> the unprofitable<WG888> servant<WG1401> into<WG1519> outer<WG1857> darkness<WG4655>: there<WG1563> shall be<WG2071> weeping<WG2805> and<WG2532> gnashing<WG1030> of teeth<WG3599>.

When<WG3752> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall come<WG2064> in<WG1722> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG32> holy<WG40> angels<WG32> with<WG3326> him<WG846>, then<WG5119> shall he sit<WG2523> upon<WG1909> the throne<WG2362> of<WG1391> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>:

And<WG2532> before<WG1715> him<WG846> shall be gathered<WG4863> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484>: and<WG2532> he shall separate<WG873> them<WG846> one<WG240> from<WG575> another<WG240>, as<WG5618> a shepherd<WG4166> divides<WG873> his sheep<WG4263> from<WG575> the goats<WG2056>:
And<WG2532> he shall set<WG2476><WG99999> the sheep<WG4263> on<WG1537> his<WG846> right hand<WG1188>, but<WG1161> the goats<WG2055> on<WG1537> the left<WG2176>.

Then<WG5119> shall<WG2046> the King<WG935> say<WG2046> to them<WG3588> on<WG1537> his<WG846> right hand<WG1188>, Come<WG1205>, you blessed<WG2127> of<WG3962> my<WG3450> Father<WG3962>, inherit<WG2816> the kingdom<WG932> prepared<WG2090> for you<WG5213> from<WG575> the foundation<WG2602> of the world<WG2889>:

For<WG1063> I was hungry<WG3983>, and<WG2532> you gave<WG1325> me<WG3427> food<WG5315>: I was thirsty<WG1372>, and<WG2532> you gave<WG4222> me<WG3165> drink<WG4222>: I was<WG2252> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> you took<WG4863> me<WG3165> in<WG4863>:

Naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> you clothed<WG4016> me<WG3165>: I was sick<WG770>, and<WG2532> you visited<WG1980> me<WG3165>: I was<WG2252> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> you came<WG2064> to<WG4314> me<WG3165>.

When<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> you<WG4571> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> took you in<WG4863>? or<WG2228> naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> clothed you<WG4016>
Or<WG1161> when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> you<WG4571> sick<WG772>, or<WG2228> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> to<WG4314> you<WG4571>?

And<WG2532> the King<WG935> shall answer<WG611> and say<WG2046> to them<WG846>, Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, Inasmuch<WG1909> as<WG3745> you have done<WG4160> it to<WG80> one<WG1520> of the least<WG1646> of these<WG5130> my<WG3450> brothers<WG80>, you have done<WG4160> it to me<WG1698>.

Then<WG5119> shall he say<WG2046> also<WG2532> to them<WG3588> on<WG1537> the left hand<WG2176>, Depart<WG4198> from<WG575> me<WG1700>, you cursed<WG2672>, into<WG1519> everlasting<WG166> fire<WG4442>, prepared<WG2090> for the devil<WG1228> and<WG2532> his<WG846> angels<WG32>:

I was<WG2252> a stranger<WG3581>, and<WG2532> you took<WG4863> me<WG3165> not<WG3756> in<WG4863>: naked<WG1131>, and<WG2532> you clothed<WG4016> me<WG3165> not<WG3756>: sick<WG772>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> you visited<WG1980> me<WG3165> not<WG3756>.

Then<WG5119> shall<WG611> they<WG846> also<WG2532> answer<WG611> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, when<WG4219> saw we<WG1492> you<WG4571> hungry<WG3983>, or<WG2228> thirsty<WG1372>, or<WG2228> a stranger<WG3581>, or<WG2228> naked<WG1131>, or<WG2228> sick<WG772>, or<WG2228> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>, and<WG2532> did<WG1247> not<WG3756> minister<WG1247> to you<WG4671>?

Then<WG5119> shall he answer<WG611> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, Inasmuch<WG1909> as<WG3745> you did<WG4160> it not<WG3756> to one<WG1520> of the least<WG1646> of these<WG5130>, you did<WG4160> it not<WG3761> to me<WG1698>.
